Hi,


    we are settings the data source in hibernate.cfg.xml in this way
=

<property name=3D"hibernate.connection.datasource">
java:comp/env/jdbc/Dis=
closureDataSource
</property>
<property name=3D"dialect">org.hibernate.dial=
ect.OracleDialect</property>

please check this. if have any suggestions te=
ll me.
